db:select.db:sql: SELECT o.orderId, op.productId, op.quantity, p.price, p.productName, o.createdBy, o.orderDate, o.userId, o.productStoreId from e_com_mule_db.order o LEFT JOIN e_com_mule_db.orderproduct op ON o.orderId = op.orderId LEFT JOIN e_com_mule_db.product p ON op.productId = p.productId WHERE o.orderId=:orderId;

ee:message.ee:set-payload: %dw 2.0 output application/json var ordeHeader= { "orderId": payload[0].orderId, "userId": payload[0].userId, "orderDate": payload[0].orderDate, "createdBy":payload[0].createdBy, "productStoreId":payload[0].productStoreId } --- { (ordeHeader), products: payload map ($ -- ordeHeader) }

ee:variables.ee:set-variable: %dw 2.0 output application/java var productId= (payload.products.*productId) joinBy "','" --- "select productId,quantity from product where productId in ('" ++ productId ++ "' )"

ee:message.ee:set-payload: %dw 2.0 output application/json --- { Status:"order Canceled", Reason: "product is out of stock" }

ee:variables.ee:set-variable: %dw 2.0 output application/java var payload01 = vars.originalPayload var data = payload01.orderId as Number ++ ",'" ++ payload01.orderName ++ "','" ++ payload01.orderDate ++ "','" ++ payload01.createdBy ++ "','" ++ payload01.productStoreId ++ "','" ++ payload01.userId --- "INSERT INTO e_com_mule_db.order (orderId, orderName, orderDate, createdBy, productStoreId, userId) values (" ++ data ++ "');"

db:bulk-insert.doc:name: Bulk insert
db:bulk-insert.db:sql: INSERT INTO e_com_mule_db.orderproduct (orderId, productId, quantity) values (:orderId,:productId , :quantity);

db:bulk-update.doc:name: Bulk update
db:bulk-update.db:sql: UPDATE e_com_mule_db.product SET quantity = :quantity WHERE productId = :productId;

ee:message.ee:set-payload: %dw 2.0 output application/json --- { status:"order has been placed succuccessfully", orderId:vars.originalPayload.orderId }
